choices: The Swapping Spirit
Lost and Found
A Hotel of Swapping
A Body Swap Story
1.content:
So, what episode will you read?

The Swapping Spirit - One day, Bill and friends find a strange looking object. When one of them accidentally drops it, a ghostly figure comes out and disappears. The ghostly figure is a nameless, mischievous spirit with the ability to swap things between people. The Spirit never changes people physically. Because they found and freed the Spirit, Bill and the group are always aware of the kinds of changes that take place, but they are not completely immune. The Spirit can still preform swaps on them, and while they are aware of what might have changed with them, they are still affected. The Spirit can swap lives, wardrobes, relationships, personalities, and work/school between people. It can also do partial versions of swaps like relationship, work/school and aspects of personalities. Reality adjusts for each of the Sprit's swaps, and everyone other than Bill and his friends view the changes as completely normal. The Spirit also usually follows one of the group, and performs swaps in area they are in.


Lost and Found - Bill, his friends, their families, and others find lost items. Though they're not ordinary items. They compel the one who finds them to pick them up and while the person who finds it originally intends to turn them in, they forget about the item and end up taking it home, and eventually decide to keep it. Their personality will then slowly start to change to reflect what they found(Ex: Bill finds a doll, he will slowly gain the personality of a little girl.). No physical transformations, only mental. No one will find their change of personality to be odd.


A Hotel of Swapping - The Sanders, the Sato, the Daniels, the Thomas families, and Jenny all go on vacation together. During their stay at the hotel, the families begin to act differently. The hotel is actually cursed, and guests who stay there start to slowly swap personalities with other guests. The Hotel is run by a woman named Ms. Sterious. No physical transformations, only mental.


A Body Swap Story - Due to a magical artifact that they found, Bill and Yuki, and Megan and Adam swap bodies respectively. Both groups try to pretend to be the other without anyone finding out until they fix this mess, and neither know that the other group has swapped. Other body swaps are allowed.
1.title: Which Episode

choices: The Spirit performs a swap between two of them right now
The Spirit performs a swap between one of them and someone else nearby
The Spirit performs a swap between two random people on the street
The Spirit waits to swap, and it remain unknown as they go to school
The Spirit waits to swap, and it remain unknown as they go to Bill's house
11.content:
It was a seemingly ordinary day, and Bill and his friends were making their way to their destination, talking amongst themselves. As they made their way there, Bill caught sight of something, and walked over to pick it up. Holding it up, it looked like some sort of small statue made out of stone.

"Hey guys, check this out." he said as he walked back over to the others..

"Whats that?" Megan asked.

"I have no idea, I just found it." Bill said as he handed it to her.

She looked it over carefully. "I've never seen anything like this before." she said.

"Hey, can I see it?" Kyoko asked.

"Sure, but be careful, it looks really old." Megan said as she passed it to her best friend. However, as she was giving it to her, the statue emitted a faint glow, startling the two girls, and the both let go, and it fell to the ground, and broke.

"Whoops..." Kyoko said, embarrassed by what she had caused.

Just then, the statue began to glow brightly, and the seven of them thought they saw a ghostly figure rise up out of it, but it quickly disappeared.
11.title: The Swapping Spirit

choices: The Spirit swaps Bill and Yuki's clothes
The Spirit swaps Megan and Adam's personalities
The Spirit swaps Ken and Jenny's work&school
111.content:
"What the hell was that?" Adam asked in confusion, staring at the broken statue on the ground.

"I have no clue." Ken said.

As they all wondered what had just happened, they were unaware of what they had done. The statue was a container for a mischievous Spirit, who had the power to swap things between humans, and could swap lives, wardrobes, relationships, personalities, and work/school between people. And now that it was free, it was ready to do just that. But first, it decided to give "thanks" to the group that had freed it, and give them the honor of being its first victim.

As Bill and the others stood there staring and talking about the statue, there was suddenly a flash of light for a brief instant, an when it had cleared, the change was done.

112.content:
"What the hell was that?" Adam asked in confusion, staring at the broken statue on the ground.

"I have no clue." Ken said.

As they all wondered what had just happened, they were unaware of what they had done. The statue was a container for a mischievous Spirit, who had the power to swap things between humans, and could swap lives, wardrobes, relationships, personalities, and work/school between people. And now that it was free, it was ready to do just that. But first, it decided to give "thanks" to the group that had freed it, and give them the honor of being its first victim. But rather than just swapping amongst them, he decided he would swap one of them with someone else that was nearby.

It looked around, seeing a young girl of about 8 years old walking out of a house with her mother and an older girl of 18. Yes, one of those three would be perfect.

As Bill and the others stood there staring and talking about the statue, there was suddenly a flash of light for a brief instant, an when it had cleared, the change was done.

It was a seemingly ordinary day as Bill made his way through the park. He was currently on his way home, having been hanging out with Ken and Adam earlier. As he continued on his way, he caught sight of something nearby. Unable to look away, he felt drawn to it, intent on finding out what it was. As he reached it, he picked it up to look at it, and felt a strange sensation the moment he touched it, and remained unaware just how much it would affect him.

What was it that Bill found?

13.content:
Bill stretched as he got out of the car. "Finally here." he said. He, his family, his friends, and their families had all come to a luxurious looking hotel. They were here on a big vacation, and would be staying for the next two weeks.

"Yeah, thank god for that." Megan said as she exited the car. "Another hour in there and I might have died of boredom." She looked around and saw another car pull up behind their families. "Ah, looks like Kyoko's family just got here. Mom, dad, I'm gonna see if they need any help." she said.

"Thats fine, just make sure you grab your bag as well." their mother said.

"Okay." she said as she headed over to the Sato families car.

Bill's mother Michelle then looked up and admired the place. "I can't believe that this place was so cheap! In person, it looks like it should have cost a fortune!"

"I know, right?" Bill's father James said as he got out of the car as well. "And this place has everything! A pool, various clubs and activities, a great restaurant and other eating facilities, and even a small underground shopping complex!"

"Sounds pretty cool, dad." Chris said. After a bit of unloading, Bill, his brother Chris, and their father wheeled a cart with their baggage into the front desk to check in, while Bill's mother Michelle stayed behind to talk with Irene, Narumi, and Pam while his younger sister Becky play with Julie and Akari.

"Welcome to this fine hotel." the woman at the front desk greeted them. "I'm the owner, Ms. Sterious."

"Hello, I'm James Sanders. I've got a reservation here." he said and Ms. Sterious typed in the name.

"Ah yes. It says here you'll be staying here a month. Your room number is 487 on the 4th floor." Ms. Sterious said as she handed him several keys, each of them had a number 487 on them. "Here you are, your room keys. They'll make sure you're always able to get in the right room for you." she said slyly, though no one seemed to notice. "I hope you'll enjoy your stay."

"Thank you." James said as he handed two keys to Chris. "Here, give one to your mother and wait here to give her the room number."

"Got it, dad." Chris agreed as Bill and his dad then wheeled the cart over to the elevator

----------

Sometime later, when everyone was situated in their rooms, Bill exited his family's with Megan, and Ken, Kyoko, Yuki, Adam, and Jenny were waiting for them. Jenny's family wasn't staying here like the rest, and she had come with Ken's family. Since the four families had booked at the same time, they were able to get rooms that were right next to each other.

"Okay! Our vacation officially starts now!" Kyoko loudly declared.

"Um, what should we do first?" Yuki asked.

"Lets go for a walk around the hotel and get to know where everything is first." Megan suggested.

"Sounds good." Bill agreed. "Lets head down to the lobby and check things out."
13.title: A Hotel of Swapping

choices: Bill will swap personalities with Megan

131.content:
As they got off the elevator, Bill and co looked around, hoping to find something interesting for them to do. "So now what?" Adam asked.

"I don't know. Lets look around. Theres got to be plenty to do." Bill said.

"Yeah, with all the stuff we could do, its all a matter of deciding on what to do." Kyoko said. "So what do you guys wanna do?"

As the seven of them all talked about what they could do, they were unaware as the magic of the hotel began to take effect on them. Soon, they would all be swapping personalities amongst one another, and would never notice the difference.

So then, who will Bill swap personalities with?

132132.content:
Bill and his family head up to the room and begin to unpack. There are a lot of clothes and other items to unpack, so it took a while.

In the middle of this event, however, something strange seemed to happen. As Bill and his mother passed each other, a strange wind seemed to pass between the two of them. They looked at each other.

"Did you feel that?" Asked Bill.

"Yeah... but the window is closed... Maybe I should head down to the lobby and complain about the windows...." Michelle contemplated.

"Oh, I can do it." Said Bill. He wouldn't normally say that, but for some reason, he felt he needed to be more responsible.

"OK, honey. You can head downstairs now." Michelle smiled.

Bill grabbed his mom's purse before heading out. His mom saw this but did not object.

133.content:
As the group steps off the elevator, they look around the large lobby. The hotel was very nice, and they admired the luxurious appearance of it.

"So now what?" Kyoko asked.

"I dunno. Lets look around for a bit." Bill suggested, and they all agreed. As they did, they saw the flash of camera and saw a group of attractive women on a stage while several photographers took their pictures.

"Whats going on there?" Yuki asked.

"I don't know." Bill said. "But theres a sign." He pointed at said sign that was nearby.

"Huh, what a coincidence." Megan said as she walked over and read the sign. "Starting today, theres also a fashion show, and photo shoot for various magazines going on for the next two weeks."

"Oh, that sounds cool." Jenny says. "Maybe I should check it out some time while we're staying here."

They also noticed another large group walking in. It was a large number girl all checking in, and all of them were dressed in the same cheerleading uniform. They were all chatting amongst each other, and they overheard them mentioning staying here on vacation and using the hotels facilities to practice.
133.title: Bill and co. will swap personalities with other...

choices: They watch the models for a while
Bill meets the brunette he saw earlier
Ken and Adam also start to swap with two of the other models
1331.content:
As the walked past the fashion show, Bill's eyes were subconsciously drawn to it. His eyes lingered on one of the models in particular, a very attractive young brunette woman who was just walking onto the stage. She appeared to be in her early twenties. She also looked around, and seemed to stare in his direction. If he didn't know any better, he might have thought that she was looking at him.

"Hey guys, I'm hungry, lets get something to eat." Adam suggested, and everyone agreed.

They all made their way to a nearby place and walked in. The interior resembled a fast food place. Making their way to the counter, they each ordered something. When it was Bill's turn, he was hungry, but he didn't want any of the greasy, fatty foods on the menu. "I'll just take a salad. I need to watch my figure." he said, adding the reason absentmindedly. No one seemed to notice the oddity of what he said.

As they sat and ate, they all talked for a bit, and decided to split up and look around. Once they were done, Megan, Kyoko, Yuki, and Jenny left together, leaving the guys to themselves for now. "So, what should we do?" Ken asked.

After a bit of thought, Bill knew exactly what he wanted to do. "Hey, lets head back and watch that fashion show for a bit. I couldn't care less about the actual show itself, but some of those women were freaking hot as hell." He was hoping to see that brunette one again in particular. She was absolute beautiful, and he wouldn't mind looking at her again.

"Well, when you put it like that, I'm never against staring at hot women." Adam said.

Ken closed his eyes, and shook his head, a mocking smirk on his face. "Ah, the desperation of being single. I suppose that I have no choice but to come with you as you ogle those women."

"Oh, shut up Ken! Don't act like you're taking the moral high ground, your motives are the same as ours." Adam said with a laugh. The three of them then got up and headed back to where the models were.
1331.title: Bill will swap personalities with one of the mo...

choices: Bill goes with Natalie backstage
Meanwhile, with the girls
13312.content:
The three of them headed back towards the stage area, and saw there was seats set up for anyone who wanted to watch. Sitting down, the three boys watched all the woman as they came on the stage. Ken and Adam both enjoyed starring at each woman who came out, but Bill wasn't paying as much attention as they were, and was surveying the area for one in particular.

'Don't see the brunette woman from earlier.' Bill thought as he noticed he seemed to be looking for her more than he was paying attention to the other models. 'Ah well, I'll just enjoy looking at the rest of them.' he thought. However, not long after, he needed to use the bthroom, and excused himself.

Using the bathroom, he stood at the urinal, and his thoughts drifted back to the brunette woman. If he didn't know any better, he would have thought he was becoming obsessed with her. Not taking long, he washed his hands and exited the bathroom, coincidentally at the same time as someone was coming out of the woman's bathroom.

It was the same brunette woman that he had seen earlier, and had seemed to be caught up in seeing her again. Bill was so surprised that he was nearly speechless. The woman in question looked him over. "I recognize you. I saw you looking at me earlier." she said.

"Me? No, I wasn't, er, I mean I was, but uh..." Bill stammered out.

The woman giggled at the boy's nervousness. "Its okay. Trust me, you aren't the first person to ever stare at me, and I'm used to guys ogling me by now." she said. "Anyway, I'm Natalie. Its nice to meet you."

"I'm Bill." he introduced himself nervously.

"So, where are you heading?" she inquired.

"Uh, well, I was kinda with my friends, and well, we were watching the girls at the fashion show..." he said.

"Hm, you don't strike me as the type to be interested in the kind fashion on display." Natalie said jokingly. She then giggled at the boys embarrassment. "Oh, don't worry. Trust me, you're not the only guy ever to watch something like that to watch attractive woman." she said. "Hey, do you want to make your friends jealous?" she asked, and Bill looked a bit confused. "C'mon, I'll let you in back stage."

"What? Really?"

"Sure its no problem."
13312.title: Bill meets the brunette he saw earlier

choices: Bill heads back to his room to get his phone
Bill looks around to try and find them
133121.content:
Bill followed Natalie onto the backstage area. He

"Not that you probably care about these details, but todays just a sort of warm up for the rest of the event. Today we just wear what we want, while tomorrow we start doing a bunch of different shoots." Natalie said.

Strangely enough, Bill payed attention to every word. For some reason, he seemed to grow more and more interested in the show, and attributed it to the fact that he would get to look at Natalie and the rest of the models more.

As he followed Natalie as they walked around backstage, he glanced at the clothing that was being brought in for the rest of the week. He had a brief thought about what it would be like if he was a model in the show and what it would be like to wear those clothes, but that quickly passed.

After a bit, he thanked Natalie for taking him back stage. and walked out. However, he didn't see Ken or Adam anywhere. "Did those two ditch me?" he questioned. He then reached into his pocket to call them to see where they had gone, but then realized that his phone wasn't in his pocket.
133121.title: Bill goes with Natalie backstage

He decides to relax in his room for a while
1331211.content:
Bill headed back up to his room, since he wasn't really sure where else to go alone. He had left his cellphone in there, and he couldn't really get in touch with anyone

Standing in front of room 487, he inserted his key, but it didn't seem to work. "Huh? Well thats strange." he tried it a bit more, but the result remained the same. It was then that he noticed his key. Instead of the number 487, it instead had the number 823 on it. "I thought this was our room, but I guess I must have been mistaken." he said as he went back to the elevator and took it up to the 8th floor.

Once there, he found his way to room 823. He inserted his key in the slot, and this time, it worked just fine and the door opened. Inside was a room the room was a single bed, and he realized what his previous problem had been. "Oh yeah, thats right, I got my own room." Bill said to himself out loud. "That was why my key hadn't worked."

As he entered, he was surprised by how nice the inside was, even better than the inside of the one that the rest of his family was staying in. It looked to be bigger than theirs despite being for only one person. There was even a jacuzzi. He then sees his cellphone sitting on a desk, and walks over to it. He also sees several cases of luggage. "Huh, I don't remember bringing more than one suitcase, but I guess must have." he comments. He also sees a purse on the desk next to his cell. Without a second thought, he slings it over his shoulder as he dials Ken's number. "I shouldn't forget this next time." he says, referring to the purse rather than his cell.
1331211.title: Bill heads back to his room to get his phone

After a minute, Ken picks up. "Oh, hey Bill. We were wondering were you went. You were gone so long, we thought you ditched us." he said.

"Yeah? Thats what I thought." Bill replied. "Anyway, where are you? We should meet up."

Ken replies...

133121111.content:
"We got changed and went down to the pool." Ken said.

"Yeah? I'll meet you guys down there then." You say.

"Sounds great." he replied before you hand up.

Putting his purse and phone back on the desk, he then heads over to his luggage, he opened the one where he was sure that he packed his bathing suits and pool supplies, and found nothing but women's clothes.

Now Bill had never seen any of these clothes before, and had never even had any thoughts about wearing women's clothes before. However, they were in his room, so they must be his clothes, his brain rationalized through the magic of the hotel, and his memory was altered so that he believed he had only ever worn women's clothes. And also through the magic, the clothes inside had already altered their sizes to fit him perfectly when his key had made this his room. And all of its contents that had used to belong to Natalie, the original owner of this room, as well as the model who he was currently in the process of exchanging personalities with, now belonged to him.

Digging around, he found a blue bikini that he decided to wear, and then undressed and put it on. It fit him perfectly of course, as he recalled how he had tried it on before buying it. The top piece fit perfectly on hs flat chest, and the lower half fit him just as well. After that, he dug around in his bag and grabbed a pair of sunglasses, and a few other supplies such as sunblock that he put in a bag before he headed back downstairs.

As he walked through the lobby, no one batted an eye at the sight of a 16 year old boy wearing a woman's bikini, everything seeming perfectly normal to everyone. As he reached the pool,
133121111.title: "We got changed and went down to the pool."

After a ringing for a bit, it goes to Ken's answering machine. "Huh. Guess he must have forgotten his phone in the room as well." he says, then left a message telling him to call him back. He then tried Adam's number just in case, and met with a similar result. "Guess we all forgot our phones." he comments to himself. "Well, since I don't really know where they are, I guess I'll just relax in my room for a while."

Putting his purse and phone back on the desk. Looking at his luggage, since they would be staying here at the hotel for a while, he might as well get comfortable and start unpacking his stuff. Bill finished putting away the contents of that luggage, as well as the contents of the other ones.

She stared at him too.He started to feel out of place among all these white people(even though he was caucasian himself).He wished there was more people of color at the show.He also felt fat.Most of the girls were skinnier than him.Ken found he liked some of the clothes the girls were wearing (especially the black girl's.She had style) and wished he could try some of them on.He knew he'd look ridiculous though.Maybe he could dress up in his hotel room where no one could see him he thought.He also craved a cigarette.He wasn't working so he could slip outside or into the bathoom and have one.He had never smoked before and would have to buy some brown ones."I have to use the restroom."he told his friends."I'll go with you."Adam said.He had been watching an asian girl strut.Bill stayed to watch the show.Ken walked over to a hispanic maid and asked her where he could buy some cigarettes.She told him where a grocery store was located.Ken and Adam went down there on foot.It wasn't far.Ken was pissed that no one was checking him out.What was wrong with him.It was probably these dull clothes he was wearing he thought."Maybe they are all gay."he said."What?'Adam asked."I think all the guys around here are gay."Ken said.Adam giggled.

133132.content:
As Ken's personality swap with the black model progressed, Adam's own personality swap was just beginning. And the one he was now swapping with was the asian model he had been watching.

As Adam accompanied Ken on his cigarette run, Adam found himself starting to become much quiter than he normally would be, and felt a bit different being around all these people he didn't know. He was normally a pretty laid back and outgoing individual. But for some reason, he was starting to think differently. He'd much rather be more calm, and thought back to the asian model at the show. In fact, as he thought about the asain model, he started to think about Japanese things in general. Maybe he could talk to Kyoko and Yuki to teach him more about Japanese culture. He felt like he should at least know the language.

He had zoned out so much that by the time he started paying attention again, Ken had just finished purchasing his cigarettes. He then went to an area designated for smoking. After a moment of smoking, feeling like he had been doing it for years even though this was his first time ever. Once he was done with one, the two headed back to the show.

Some time later, Ken and Adam returned to the show and found Bill. "Hey, did we miss anything?"

"Yeah, there was a lot of really nice clothes shown off." he replied.

"Thats a shame." Adam commented. The three of them now believed that they had come to the show in the first place to see all the fashionable clothes shown off. As they watched, they each looked for the model they had been paying the most attention to. When they found them, they were standing off to the side of the stage. All three were together, and talking.
133132.title: Adam changes with the asian

1333.content:
They continue walking, and look around the first floor. As they do, they notice a few people walk past them wearing swim wear, and go down a hallway with a sign pointing down it saying "Pool."

"Hey, we could always go swimming." Kyoko suggests.

"That might not be such a bad idea." Jenny says. "And those who don't want to swim can just relax by the pool."

"I dont know if I'm in the mood for that." Yuki says.

Looking around, Ken noticed another sign. "Hey, check it out. We could use the Gym & Athletic Area over there." he said.

"Leave it to the sports nut to suggest that." Adam said.

"What that supposed to mean? You know I don't play any."

"Thats only because you don't want to join a team."

"Hey, don't start a pointless argument you two." Megan said, though she was looking right at Adam when she said it. "We're on vacation, so don't bicker about pointless things like that."
1333.title: Bill will swap with somone else

choices: Bill will swap personalities with the sunbathing girl
Bill will swap personalities with one of the young girls playing
13331.content:
"Lets just go to the pool. Its kinda hot today, and I want to cool off." Megan suggests.

"Yeah, why not?" Bill agrees.

----------

They all headed back up to their rooms to get changed into their swim wear. Not long after, they all walked outside towards the pool. "Wow, its pretty big!" Kyoko marveled as she saw it.

"Yeah." Jenny agreed. "Anyway, lets set up somewhere. I'm just gonna relax for a bit."

"Okay." they agreed. As they set up, Bill looked around at all the people around the pool. He noticed an attractive girl that was maybe a year or two older than him sunbathing.

As the group keeps walking around, Bill sees a couple of young girls, maybe around 7 or 8 years old, playing together in the shallow end of the pool, splashing each other and such.
13331.title: They head to the pool, and Bill swaps personali...

choices: Bill and co. will swap personalities with someone in one of the clubs.
Bill and co. will swap personalities with other guests
13333.content:
"You know, we could always take part in one of the clubs while we're here, since we're staying for a while. We could see what the've got." Kyoko suggested as she pointed to a doorway to a hall that "Clubrooms" over it.

"That doesn't sound like a bad idea." Bill agreed. "What do you guys say?"
13333.title: Bill and co. will swap personalities with other...

choices: When they pass the Kids daycare play area
When they pass the senior center at the hotel
They find something else to swap with?
134.content:
Bill and his friends decide to explore the hotel a bit.

When will the first swap occur?
134.title: Bill and co. will swap personalities with other...

choices: Bill, Ken, and Adam continue playing with the little girls
Meanwhile, with Megan, Kyoko, Yuki, and Jenny
Something else
1341.content:
As the group of friends were walking throught the hotel, the eventually passed by the hotel's daycare area, where parent's could leave younger kids while they

As they passed by, they all suddenly felt strangely compelled to take a look at what was going on. It was a large area with a fenced off area. There were multiple rooms that led inside for kids to play and have fun with various activities, toys, and games. The group found themselves watching the kids play. In particular, Bill seemed to pay the most attention to a little girl that looked to be about 7 or 8. She was wearing a frilly pink dress, and had her hair in pigtails, and she was playing with some other girls her age. Ken and Adam also found themselves watching those group of girls, though were watching different girls. As for Megan, Kyoko, Yuki, and Jenny, they were watching a group of boys playing. Unknown to the seven of them, they had began the process of swapping personalities with kid they were watching most, with the three boys swapping with three of the little girls, and the four girls swapping with four of the little boys.

They didn't realize it, but they kept watching for a few minutes. A few times, the kids they had been watching took notice, and would lock eyes with them for a bit. After a few more minutes, three of the little girls that they had been watching, like the one Bill had been paying the most attention to, stopped playing. The same went for the four little boys that Megan and the girls had been paying attention to.

"Hey, what are you doing out here?" they suddenly heard someone say to them, and turned to see one of the daycare attendants.

"We were-"

"You all know your not allowed to wander around. You have to stay in the area until your parents return to pick you up."

"Oh." Bill said, confused as the attendant ushered them all into the eclosed area. As they were lead in, Bill watched as the kids they had been watching earlier walked passed them out of the play area. The attendant didn't say anything to them as they passes, though after they left he wondered aloud what they had been doing there in the first place.

The strangeness of the situation wore off, and as they stood in the daycare area, Bill turned to his friends. "So, what should we do until our parents come get us?" he asked them. They had forgotten that they had been wandering around, and now believed that they had been dropped off by their parents earlier.

"Dunno." Megan replied, and everyone else shrugged as well.

"Guess we'll figure something out." Bill said as they decied to split up. Ken and Adam tagged along behind him. As they walked, Bill noticed the remaining girls that they had been watching, and felt compelled to walk over to them. "Hi."

"Hi!" one girl said. "Wanna play with us?"

"What are you playing?" Ken asked.

"We're playing with dolls!" another girl said as she held some up.

With a shrug, Bill sat down. "Sure, I guess we could." he said as he picked up a doll that he thought was particularly cute. Ken and Adam joined him, and the three teens started playing dolls with the little girls. As they did, they found themselves enjoying it. Bill started to "remember" how much he actually enjoyed playing with dolls. The three boys were unaware of their change as they slowly began to aquire the interests of little girls as the start of their personality swap.
1341.title: When they pass the Kids daycare play area

choices: They see a famous pop star at the pool
They pass the hotel's fitness center
They swap at another area
1343.content: What about one of these options?
1343.title: They find something else to swap with?

info.brief_description: A collection of the strange misadventures of a group of friends.
info.description:
Main Characters:
Bill Sanders - Age 16. Average guy, enjoys watching football, and is a bit of a nerd, and enjoys anime and video games. Gets along well with his twin sister Megan.
Megan Sanders - Age 16. Bill's twin sister. Pretty friendly, and gets along well with most people, Adam being one of the exceptions They often argue, and don't get along very well, but Megan has a secret crush on him.
Ken Daniels - Age 17. Bill's best friend. Is the most athletic of his friends(Bill and Adam), though he doesn't really play any sports.
Kyoko Sato - Age 16. Yuki's twin sister and Megan's best friend. She and her family are Japanese, though she grew up in America. Cheerful, outgoing, and excitable, Kyoko is usually described as always fun to be around. She also usually drags her sister Yuki along where ever she goes.
Yuki Sato - Age 16. Kyoko's twin sister. Contrasting her sister's outgoing and excitable nature, Yuki is more quiet, shy, and demure, and enjoys reading. She has a crush on Bill. Unlike her sister, she wears glasses.
Adam Thomas - Age 16. Laid back, and doesn't take a lot of things seriously. Usually doesn't get along well with Megan, though he does try to be nice to her.
Jenny Harris - Age 16. Ken's girlfriend. and a cheerleader at school. Usually nice, though she is said to be scary when she loses her temper.

Bill is the default character, but feel free to switch off and follow one of the other main characters.

Their families, except Jenny's, are all friends and know each other.

Sanders Family:
Becky Sanders - Age 8. Bill and Megan's girly little sister. Best friends with Julie and Akari.
Chris Sanders - Age 19. Bill and Megan's older brother.
James Sanders - Bill and Megan's father.
Michelle Sanders - Bill and Megan's mother.

Daniels Family:
Heather Daniels - Age 13. Ken's younger sister. Typical girly-girl, which contrasts her best friend Heather's tomboyish personality.
Julie Daniels - Age 9. Ken's youngest sister.
Irene Daniels - Ken's single mother.

Sato Family:
Daichi Sato - Age 10. Kyoko and Yuki's younger brother. Good friends with Mike.
Akari Sato - Age 8. Kyoko and Yuki's younger sister.
Makoto Sato - Kyoko and Yuki's father.
Narumi Sato - Kyoko and Yuki's mother.

Thomas Family:
Mike Thomas - Age 12. Adam's younger brother.
Rachel Thomas Age 14 - Adam's younger sister. Heathers best friend, though in contrast to her, is a bit of a tomboy.
Gary Thomas - Adam's father.
Pam Thomas - Adam's mother.

Harris Family:
Mary Harris - Jenny's mother.
Jack Harris - Jenny's father.

Feel free to add other characters outside of the families that you want.

Anyway, this is a special collection of different types of storylines focusing on the same characters. Theres only four ideas for now, but I'll add more "episodes" as I come up with them.
Also, I may take suggestions for other episodes, so you can send me any you want. However, I won't take many "standard transformation" stories, like for example, Bill slowly transforms into a woman and his mind adjusts to the change. In fact, I'm more likely to accept ideas that don't involve any physical changes at all. That said, I will include a few standard types, like a body swap storyline.

The rules for the story vary depending on what "episode" you select, but rules that apply to all paths:
No sex
No killing off characters
No ending the story
No one option paths. Always leave at least two options
Try to have good grammar.
While its okay in early parts of the story, as it goes on, no one line additions. Try to write at least a paragraph
Keep thing consistent with what happened in the path, and read to make sure you don't contradict things before you post


Have fun!
